title: Input-output supply and use tables
summary: Estimates of industry inputs and outputs, product supply and demand and Gross Value Added (GVA) for the United Kingdom. Supply and use tables for 1997 to 2014 that are consistent with UK National Accounts in Blue Book 2016.
metaDescription: A source for the data underlying Gross Domestic Product. These balances provide a single framework showing the relationship between components of value added, industry inputs and outputs, and product supply and demand.
